intro: Labatia ostenii, commonly known as the Osten's labatia, is a flowering plant native to the tropical regions of South America. It belongs to the family Malvaceae, which includes hibiscus and cotton. The plant is characterized by its showy, trumpet-shaped flowers that range in color from white to pink. It typically grows as an herbaceous perennial, often reaching heights of up to 1.5 meters. Labatia ostenii prefers moist, well-drained soils and is often found in humid, shaded environments.
